isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

purchase(uint256,uint256,address,address.details: Requires that the value sent is exactly the price of the product

params._affiliate: - the address to of the affiliate - use address(0) if none
params._assignee: - the address to assign the purchase to (doesn't have to be msg.sender)
params._numCycles: - the number of cycles being purchased. This number should be `1` for non-subscription products and the number of cycles for subscriptions.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner.     * NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newWithdrawalAddress: - the address where we'll send the funds

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawBalance().details: We set a withdrawal address seperate from the CFO because this allows us to withdraw to a cold wallet.

licenseAffiliate(uint256).notice: Get a the affiliate credited for the sale of this license

purchase(uint256,uint256,address,address.notice: Makes a purchase of a product.

withdrawBalance().notice: Withdraw the balance to the withdrawalAddress
